attributes.action: provide nottinghamshire police with enhanced funds to reduce crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every time i come accross a police officer in nottingham and ask why is it that they arrive so late to a crime scene they have one reply oh sorry but we are under resourced and other crimes take piority over this crime so we have to deal with them one at a time. thats petty we need to fund extra bobbies on the beat and i believe ts about time the goverment recognised nottingham as the up coming business hub of the midlands and help us and our city to reduce organised crime petty anti social behaviour and help eradicate social mistrust amongst the youth with the police
